analysis.summary: The 'day' field is a date type requiring day-of-month or full date input for completion tracking purposes
insights: Field name 'day' with date_completion context indicates date-related data collection
September 2025 temporal context suggests forward-looking completion dates
Ambiguous whether this expects day-of-month (1-30) or full date format
No party specified indicates general applicability across entities
recommendations: Implement as date type with full date picker (MM/DD/YYYY or DD/MM/YYYY based on locale)
Add validation for valid dates within reasonable range (e.g., current date to 2 years future)
Consider renaming to 'completion_date' for clarity if full date intended
Set medium-high priority as completion dates are typically critical for workflow tracking
